law.catch_line: Notice by insurer of paid-up life insurance policy.

text.section: The commissioner shall retain the notice required by subsection (1) of this section in a manner that will facilitate response to policyholder inquiries regarding their policy in the event of loss or destruction of the policy, or in the event of acquisition or merger of the insurer.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1180, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2008.
